card.name: CC - EH_5 (6) - Speedily enable/disable branches and users

data.text:
I've mailed through a few spelling errors when disabling / enabling branches and users. 

I have picked up an issue though, if I selected multiple users to enable or disable, it shows that i've selected 2 or more, but only disables one of them. @lungisaximbi @stefanbar
